content: from * across to last 3 sts work mod fpdc around each of next 2 double_crochet in second row below single_crochet in last single_crochet turn row 4 repeat row 2 changing to a on last single_crochet turn row 5 using a chain 1 single_crochet in first single_crochet * work mod fpdc around each of next 2 mod fpdc in second row below single_crochet in each of next 2 single_crochet repeat from * across to last 3 sts work mod fpdc around each of next 2 mod fpdc in second row below single_crochet in last single_crochet turn row 6 repeat row 2 changing to b on last single_crochet turn row 7 repeat row 5 repeat row 4 7 for stitch pattern notes when changing colors at end of row change to new color while working last st as follows insert hook and pull up loop with current color yarn over with next color and draw through 2 loops single_crochet completed colors are alternated every 2 row when changing colors do not fasten off previous color carry it along side of work when working first round of border work over carried yarn for a neat edge throw using larger hook and a chain 105 begin stitch pattern 104 sts after row 1 work even in stitch pattern until a total of 161 row have been completed fasten_off b border change to smaller hook continue with a http //www caron com/projects/slip_stitch/soften_their_world html page 2 of 3 caron international yarns and latch hook kits 09/13/2007 01 19 pm round 1 chain 1 work 3 single_crochet in side of last single_crochet worked corner * single_crochet in each row end along side edge working 3 single_crochet in corner st * single_crochet in each unworked loop of beginning chain lower edge working 3 single_crochet in corner st repeat * to * once single_crochet in each st across upper edge join with a slip st to first single_crochet round 2 chain 1 working in back loop only single_crochet in each single_crochet around working 3 single_crochet in each corner st center st of 3-single_crochet at corners join with a slip st to first single_crochet fasten_off a join b with a slip st in any corner st round 3 using b repeat round 2 fasten_off finishing using yarn needle weave in all ends || yarns || free projects ||
